product_name: Benefit CosmeticsBenetint Buddy Lip & Cheek Tint Duo Gift Set
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingYour Benetint Buddy is sending an urgent alert. It's craving a full-size rose tint & dark cherry treat in the Benetint Buddy Lip & Cheek Tint Duo Gift Set! After a long day of tinting & leveling up lips & cheeks, it deserves a reward. Keep your tint game strong with the sheer, buildable Benetint.
details: DetailsIncludesBenetint rose-tinted lip & cheek stain full-sizeBenetint dark cherry-tinted lip & cheek stain full-sizeItem 2643575How To UseGlide across lips. Keep layering to deepen color. Dot onto cheeks and blend in quickly.IngredientsAqua (Water), Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Polysorbate 20, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Hydroxyacetophenone, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Parfum (Fragrance), Sodium Hydroxide, Tetrasodium Edta, Maltodextrin, Citric Acid, Geraniol, Citronellol, Linalool, Hexyl Cinnamal. May Contain: CI 75470 (Carmine). N° 19584Aqua (Water), Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Polyglyceryl-4 Caprate, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Hydroxyacetophenone, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Parfum (Fragrance), Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Sodium Hydroxide, Citric Acid, Geraniol, Citronellol, Linalool, Hexyl Cinnamal. May Contain: CI 42090 (Blue 1), CI 17200 (Red 33), CI 15985 (Yellow 6). N° 21320Disclaimer: Product Ingredient Listings Are Updated Periodically.
